text:
dwayne "the rock" johnson accepts the generation award

After a look back on his career, The Rock talks about his struggle breaking into Hollywood and why you should never compromise who you are, because it is your greatest asset.
title: MTV Movie & TV Awards 2019 MTV & TV Awards

meta_data.description: The 2019 MTV Movie & TV Awards will be hosted by "Shazam!" star Zachary Levi. A star-studded list of presenters will include Melissa McCarthy, Tiffany Haddish and Kumail Nanjiani, and musical guests include Bazzi, who will perform "Paradise," and Lizzo. Jada Pinkett Smith will be named the Trailblazer Award winner, and Dwayne "The Rock" Johnson will be named the Generation Award winner.
